attributes.comment:
Adoptive Parent - Gina Rumbaugh

I respectfully request that you retain the current fee schedule for adoption-related
services, primarily for the I-600A at $545 and fingerprints at $70.

Because the I-600A expires after 18 months and must be re-submitted in order for
an adoption to continue if it has not been completed in that amount of time, many
adoptive parents are already faced with the financial burden of paying twice. We
will likely be in that situation within a few months. Please do not raise the fees on
the I-600A and fingerprints.

Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Gina Rumbaugh
